name: Baldur's Pathfinder Bundle
description:
Baldur's Pathfinder Bundle includes: In Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Enhanced Edition, you’ll travel to Worldwound, where the opening of a rift to the Abyss has unleashed all-consuming terror across the land. Lead your crusade and face countless demonic hordes in a battle for the salvation of land consumed by war. In Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition, customize your hero, recruit a party of brave allies, and explore the Sword Coast in your search for adventure, profit… and the truth. In Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition, continue a journey started in Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition, or customize a new hero to forge your path.

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
